channel.title: Hack Club YSWS Programs
channel.description: Active "You Ship, We Ship" programs from Hack Club

item.title: Cascade
item.description:
Create animations with CSS and receive art supplies.

Deadline: December 14, 2024

Join the discussion in #cascade-ysws

item.title: Riceathon
item.description:
Customize your Linux install, and get programmer socks or a Bl√•haj.

Deadline: January 10, 2025

Join the discussion in #riceathon

item.title: RaspAPI
item.description:
Make an API get a Raspberry Pi

Deadline: March 10, 2025

Create an original API using any programming language or framework that you prefer and get a Raspberry Pi Zero 2 W to host it on! The API can be anything you want. The possibilities are endless!

Join the discussion in #raspapi-ysws

item.title: Hackpad
item.description:
Design a keyboard get the parts! Please note this is only open to those who have build a Macropad previously.

Deadline: March 16, 2025

Join the discussion in #hackpad

item.title: BrowserBuddy
item.description:
Build a Chrome extension, and Hack Club provides $30 to launch it on Chrome Web Store.

Deadline: March 19, 2025

Join the discussion in #browser-buddy

item.title: Black Box
item.description:
Create a constrained, interactive C program and get a portable device to run it on!

Deadline: March 29, 2025

Join the discussion in #black-box

item.title: Juice
item.description:
Spend 100 hours in 2 months building a game, and we'll cover your Steam release and fund a flight to China for a pop-up shop.

Deadline: April 1, 2025

Join the discussion in #juice

item.title: Jungle
item.description:
Spend time working on your game, get money to help publish it! Prizes include steam license, itch.io asset store credits, and much much more!

Deadline: April 1, 2025

Join the discussion in #jungle

item.title: Retrospect (J2ME edition)
item.description:
Create a J2ME game (Java MIDlet) and have it delivered on a J2ME-capable phone.

Deadline: April 7, 2025

Join the discussion in #retrospect

item.title: Pixeldust
item.description:
Make a neopixel based PCB, get the parts to make one!

Deadline: April 13, 2025

Create a PCB using KiCad / other EDA. It should use neopixels and a Xiao RP2040, and act as a decoration. Once submitted you can get the parts to make one yourself!

Join the discussion in #pixeldust

item.title: 10 Days of Tarot
item.description:
Build a project or feature and get exclusive prizes for each card requirement you hit.

Deadline: April 13, 2025

Join the discussion in #10-days-of-tarot

item.title: Visioneer
item.description:
Give your computer the gift of vision, get an esp32-s3-eye to see it through!

Deadline: April 20, 2025

Join the discussion in #visioneer

item.title: Infill
item.description:
Design your own 3D printer mod, get $20 to build it!

Deadline: May 4, 2025

Join the discussion in #infill

item.title: Hacklet
item.description:
Spend two hours building a creative javascript bookmarklet, get $10 to buy a domain!

Deadline: May 10, 2025

Join the discussion in #hacklet

item.title: TerminalCraft
item.description:
Build a terminal program and earn a Raspberry Pi 4

Deadline: June 21, 2025

Build & publish a cross-platform terminal app. Get 10 users, open-source it, and snag your Pi 4

Join the discussion in #terminal-craft

item.title: Solder
item.description:
Design and solder your own custom PCB with a free electronics kit!

Deadline: June 30, 2025

Join the discussion in #solder

item.title: Hackaccino
item.description:
Build a 3D website and get a free frappuccino.

Deadline: June 30, 2025

Join the discussion in #fraps

item.title: Reactive
item.description:
Ship a website built with React, get $15 to buy a domain.

Deadline: July 2, 2025

Join the discussion in #reactive

item.title: Gamefolio
item.description:
Make a interactive portfolio website, get $20 for hosting or domains

Deadline: July 2, 2025

Join the discussion in #gamefolio

item.title: Waveband
item.description:
Create a program that uses RTL-SDR, and Hack Club sends you a dongle and antenna kit.

Deadline: July 11, 2025

Join the discussion in #waveband

item.title: Converge
item.description:
Build Discord/Slack bots, we ship domain names, server hosting, Blahajs, and more

Deadline: July 15, 2025

Join the discussion in #converge

item.title: Thunder
item.description:
You Ship A Slack bot. We Ship A limited edition Orpheus bucket hat.

Deadline: July 15, 2025

Join the discussion in #thunder

item.title: Highway
item.description:
Make any hardware project, get up to 350 USD to build it! Keyboard, game console, rocket, robot, 3d printer, etc... Then, go to a 4-day hardware hackathon @ Github HQ this summer!

Deadline: July 31, 2025

Join the discussion in #highway

item.title: Shipwrecked
item.description:
You Ship 60 hours of work, 4 projects, and go viral. We Ship A ticket to an island hackathon in Boston.

Deadline: August 8, 2025

You ship 60 hours of coding work, four shipped projects, and make one of them go viral. We ship you a ticket to Shipwrecked, a four-day, in-person hackathon on Cathleen Stone Island in the Boston Harbor, with travel stipends available.

Join the discussion in #shipwrecked

item.title: Summer of Making
item.description:
Build stuff. Get stuff. Repeat.

Deadline: August 31, 2025

Join the discussion in #summer-of-making

item.title: Neighborhood
item.description:
You Ship 100 hours of coding on one project. We Ship A free summer of coding in San Francisco.

Deadline: August 31, 2025

You ship 100 hours of coding work on a single, new, open-source project. We ship you a flight to San Francisco and cover your housing, food, and transit for up to three months while you code with other teenagers.

Join the discussion in #neighborhood

item.title: Lockin
item.description:
Work on anything Wakatime-able on call with another Hack Clubber, spin for stickers at the end of the session.

Join the discussion in #lock-in

item.title: BakeBuild
item.description:
Design a cookie cutter, get it shipped!

You ship : A CAD model of a cookie cutter, we ship : A 3D printed model of your custom cookie cutter & cookies!

Join the discussion in #bakebuild

item.title: Cider
item.description:
Create an iOS app and receive a $100 Apple Developer account to publish it.

Join the discussion in #cider

item.title: Tonic
item.description:
Make a Jekyll theme, show it to the world, and we'll send you a Hack Club hat!

Join the discussion in #tonic

item.title: Sprig
item.description:
Build a JS game and play it on your own console.

Join the discussion in #sprig

item.title: Boba Drops
item.description:
Build a website and get boba!

Join the discussion in #boba

item.title: Swirl
item.description:
Create a quality website with Scoops, get ice cream!

Ship a static website (html + css) that has a Scoop, and get a grant for ice cream to enjoy! Scoops are made up of groups of three html / css features that add something of value to the website.

Join the discussion in #swirl

item.title: OnBoard Live
item.description:
Design a PCB live on YouTube for $5/hour PCB credit.

Join the discussion in #onboard-live

item.title: Grub
item.description:
You Ship A responsive website using only HTML and Tailwind CSS. We Ship A grant for junk food.

The grant amount is based on the number of unique features implemented:\n$6 (Basic Meal): For 2 unique features.\n$8 (Refreshment Combo): For 4 unique features.\n$10 (Full Combo Meal): For 6 or more unique features.

Join the discussion in #grub

item.title: Toppings
item.description:
You ship an interactive website using framework-less JavaScript, we ship you a grant to an ice cream parlor.

Join the discussion in #toppings

item.title: Waffles
item.description:
You ship a full-stack web application, and we ship you a grant to a waffle house.

Join the discussion in #waffles
